ri:Resource.title: TAPRegExt: a VOResource Schema Extension for Describing TAP Services

content.subject: standard language identifiers
virtual observatory
content.description: This document describes an XML encoding standard for metadata about TAP services. Specifically, it defines how the services' capability element is used to communicate upload methods, data formats, data models and languages supported, the languages' properties, as well as server limits.

key.name: upload-inline
key.description: Table upload inline with the request, as per section 2.5.2 of the TAP recommendation 1.0.

key.name: upload-http
key.description: Table upload by giving an http URL in the UPLOAD parameter, see section 2.5.1 of the TAP recommendation 1.0.

key.name: upload-https
key.description: Table upload by giving an https URL in the UPLOAD parameter, see section 2.5.1 of the TAP recommendation 1.0.

key.name: upload-ftp
key.description: Table upload by giving an ftp URL in the UPLOAD parameter, see section 2.5.1 of the TAP recommendation 1.0.

key.name: output-votable-td
key.description: VOTable with data in a TABLEDATA element.

key.name: output-votable-binary
key.description: VOTable with data in a BINARY stream.

key.name: output-votable-binary2
key.description: VOTable with data in a BINARY2 stream.

key.name: features-udf
key.description: An enumeration of ADQL or SQL user defined functions with their signatures. See the TAPRegExt specification for details.

key.name: features-adqlgeo
key.description: An enumeration of ADQL geometry functions implemented by the server. Support for a geometry function is declared by including a feature having just the function name in its form element.
